class.rdfs:comment: Any physical manifestation of a person's medical condition discoverable by objective diagnostic tests or physical examination.
class.rdfs:label: MedicalSign

schema:identifyingExam.rdfs:comment: A physical examination that can identify this sign.
schema:identifyingExam.rdfs:label: identifyingExam

schema:identifyingTest.rdfs:comment: A diagnostic test that can identify this sign.
schema:identifyingTest.rdfs:label: identifyingTest
